Ocean Beach Landscaping

Our Story

We have been providing professional lawn and landscape design, installation and maintenance in the Santa Monica area for over 25 years.

We strive for one goal: To provide quality workmanship to satisfy every client. Whether that be basic service and upkeep of your property, a minor sprucing up, or dramatic overhaul. Our staff of experienced landscape designer-architects will consistently meet if not exceed your expectations.

Our Services

Here is an overview of the services we provide.

  • Concept and Final Drawings
  • Concrete, Asphalt and Paver Driveways
  • Turf Installation
  • Tree Pruning
  • Site Grading and Drainage
  • Leaf Removal and Gutter Clearing
  • Tree, Shrub and Flower Planting
  • Waterfall and Stream Creation
  • Brick, Flagstone and Paver Walkways and Patios
  • Retaining and Decorative Walls
  • Mowing and Trimming
